summary: added some detail to the blades armor + new helmet
descriptionHtml:
some parts of the standard blades armor did not fit my taste, so i decided to retexture them.
(+ fixed the alpha layer for a better looking fur)
i also replaced the blades helmet whit an other mesh. (orcish helmet with new texture)
because i think it fits better to the blades armor.

this is my first retexture so dont except too much..... but i think its an improvement over the vanilla armor.
maybe some of you will like it :-)




---IMPORTANT---
this is not a HD texture so if you are looking for something like that this mod is maybe not for you

HOW TO INSTALL:
extract the packed folder into your skyrim/data directory

if you find any grammar mistakes, please be lenient towards me, english isnt my first language ;-)

-peace
author: truemaro
